none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 03, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
As soon as that doo-pa-doo-poo-da drops and the opening track "Explode" just, well....explodes all over the damn place, you know that TECHNO are compromising nothing. The buzzsaw guitar break into the bass bomb and then the ripping lead before the vocals come back in to take "Live A Lie" home. The way they slow it down just one painful notch for "I Don't Want To Starve" so they can kick you in the teeth when "On Fire" turns loose....this thing is fukkn perfect. Hollow, blown to shit, ferocious, rough punkpunk hardcore corecore. Literally everything I want in a punk tape.  TECHNO

seo.title: Techno - Techno demo - Terminal Escape
